title: Lottie Moss flashes underboob in a daring sheer top and velvet flares as she poses up a storm
text:
She was at the centre of a scandal recently when it emerged she had a fling with her ex's best friend.

Yet Lottie Moss brushed off the drama as she attended the Nasty Gal Ft. Cara Delevingne launch at The Box in London on Tuesday.

Putting her sensational figure on display, the 21-year-old model dazzled in a daring mesh top and flares.

Working it: She was at the centre of a scandal recently. Yet Lottie Moss brushed off the drama as she attended the Nasty Gal Ft. Cara Delevingne launch at The Box in London on Tuesday

Lottie flashed underboob in her quirky long sleeved top which featured a mesh panel across the chest.

She teamed the garment with flared velvet tracksuit bottoms that skimmed over a pair of chunky silver platform heels.

Lottie accessorised with a black cross body bag and styled her glossy golden locks loose and poker straight.

Vamping it up: Putting her sensational figure on display, the 21-year-old model dazzled in a daring mesh top and flares

The outing came after it was revealed by MailOnline that Made In Chelsea lothario Jamie, 30, enjoyed a brief relationship with Lottie during a trip to Los Angeles last year – despite her being co-star Alex’s former girlfriend.

Mutual pals were left stunned when Jamie made the same mistake months later by starting a relationship with Sam Thompson’s ex Sophie 'Habbs' Habboo, 25, ultimately ending their friendship.

A source revealed to MailOnline: 'Jamie and Lottie got together during a trip to LA last year. Alex was extremely hurt when he found out – Jamie was supposed to be one of his best friends and it felt like the ultimate betrayal.'

Finishing touches: Lottie accessorised with a black cross body bag and styled her glossy golden locks loose and poker straight

Lottie was also close friends with Jamie's ex-girlfriend and former co-star Frankie Gaff, 25, prior to the fling, with the girls even living together.

After the relationship came to light among Chelsea circles, Lottie moved out of the flat they shared.

An insider added: 'To make things worse, Lottie was good friends and flatmates with Jamie’s ex Frankie Gaff. She tried to keep what happened with Jamie secret but ended up moving out of Frankie’s flat when it all came to light.'

Alex, 28, dated model Lottie for nine months before they split in 2018 over their busy work schedules.
